principles: Content is King: Typography is the primary interface.
Warmth over Sterility: Use warm grays and off-whites, not clinical blue-whites.
Asymmetry in Discovery: The feed should feel like a gallery, not a spreadsheet.
Focus in Consumption: Reading views must be distraction-free.

usage.caption: font-sans text-sm text-muted-foreground uppercase tracking-wider
usage.code: font-mono text-sm bg-muted px-1 py-0.5 rounded text-primary

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the <head> of public/index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to extend the font family with 'Libre Baskerville' (serif) and 'Public Sans' (sans).
3. APPLY THEME: Update index.css with the provided CSS variables for light and dark modes. Ensure the 'paper' background color is used for the body in light mode.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, apply the 'rounded-xl' and 'rounded-full' styles as specified. Do not use default sharp corners.
5. LAYOUT: For the 'Review/Story Detail' page, use the 'reading_column' width (max-w-2xl) to ensure optimal line length for reading.
6. MICRO-INTERACTIONS: Add 'active:scale-95' to all interactive elements (buttons, cards) for a tactile feel.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) using kebab-case (e.g., 'submit-review-btn').
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text solid and high-contrast.
Glassmorphism: Use it sparingly (only for sticky headers or overlays), not for main content cards.
Spacing: Use 'gap-6' or 'gap-8' for grids. Don't cram content.
Motion: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions if possible, or simple CSS transitions for hover states.
